source: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_SEQ_00<tab>Fibubb Gah requests your assistance in testing a new remedy.
target: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_SEQ_00<tab>灰の陣営のフィブブ・ガーは、冒険者に実験の手伝いをしてほしいようだ。

source: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_SEQ_01<tab>Fibubb Gah has entrusted you with the Brotherhood of Ash's latest weapon in their kin war─a possible remedy for the madness of the tempered. Subdue the tempered found at the tempering ground in northern Zanr'ak, and test the efficacy of the sacred ash.
target: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_SEQ_01<tab>フィブブ・ガーの依頼を受けた。ザンラク北部にある3箇所の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E90DE01 /var>」で周囲を見渡し、現れたテンパードを打ち負かして「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E892701 /var>」を使おう。

source: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_SEQ_02<tab>You have tested the sacred ash on the tempered with uncertain results. Return to the Ring of Ash and report to Fibubb Gah.
target: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_SEQ_02<tab>テンパードたちに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E892701 /var>を使った。灰の陣営の「フィブブ・ガー」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_SEQ_03<tab>Though disappointed at the remedy's apparent failure, Fibubb Gah vows that the Brotherhood will continue its efforts toward creating a cure for the tempered. He muses that perhaps you just might be the one who tests the first successful batch.
target: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_SEQ_03<tab>フィブブ・ガーに報告した。彼は実験が空振りに終わったことを残念がった。しかし、まだまだ諦めるつもりはないようだ。

source: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_TODO_00<tab>Head to the tempering ground in northern Zanr'ak, and use the sacred ash on subdued tempered.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_TODO_00ザンラク北部ので見渡し、現れたテンパードを
打ち負かしてを使う

source: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_001<tab>Honored ally, the Brotherhood of Ash has toiled to create a new weapon to use against our enemies─bone ash imbued with spiritual energy by the sacred chants of our mystics.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_001強き者よ、これは我らが「灰の一党」が作りし妙薬。
……されど、未だ研究中の習作なり。

source: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_002<tab>It is our hope that the purifying properties of the ash will serve to cleanse the tempered of Ifrit's malign influence. This remedy has, however, yet to be tested.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_002この妙薬には、「焼かれし者」を元に戻す効果がある！
……やもしれぬ。
応病与薬、効果を確かめるため、実験をせねばならぬ。

source: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_003<tab>It is with bitter fortune, then, that we learned of a raid to the south. It seems that a hunting party from Forgotten Springs was ambushed by a superior force, and dragged before the Lord of the Inferno for tempering.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_003ちょうどよい、強き者よ。
「忘れられたオアシス」に住むミコッテ族どもが襲われ、
かなりの数が「焼かれし者」となったと伝え聞く。

source: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_004<tab>I ask that you locate these unfortunate Miqo'te, and sprinkle upon each a pinch of the ash.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_004この妙薬「」を、
「」の
焼かれし者たちに用いて試みよ。

source: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_005<tab>Be sure to pacify the rangers sufficiently first, otherwise our unwilling subjects will simply shake off the ash before it has time to take effect.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_005しかして、ただ使うだけでは、その効果を充分に発揮できぬ。
相手を屈服させ、無防備な状態で用いるべし。

source: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_011<tab>Find the tempered Miqo'te, and sprinkle a pinch of sacred ash upon each one to determine the remedy's efficacy. Do not forget to subdue your opponents thoroughly before attempting to use the ash!
target:
TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_011この妙薬「」を、「」の
焼かれし者たちに用いよ。
しかして、敵を屈服させ、無防備な状態で用いるべし！

source: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_021<tab>So...it seems the sacred ash failed to have the desired effect. Our mystics will be most disappointed.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_021の実験任務、まことに御苦労だった。
……残念至極、やはり「焼かれし者」は元には戻らぬか。
この習作も失敗……あな口惜しや。

source: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_022<tab>But the Brotherhood of Ash does not buckle at the slightest sign of hardship! We shall learn from this failure, and redouble our efforts to concoct a cure. You may yet be the first to reclaim a tempered mind from the abyss of madness.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_022破天荒解なお遠く、されど我は諦めぬ。
この挫折に学び、次こそ完全なる妙薬を完成させん。
……強き者よ、そのときは再び頼むぞ！
TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_POP_MESSAGE_000_000<tab>その行動は出現した敵を倒さないと実行できません
